name: f(x)
description:
"Nothing takes place in the world whose meaning is not that of some maximum or minimum." - Leonhard Euler

In f(x), fight as a lone wolf against the never-ending army of the Zahlen, numeric entities that wish to overwhelm and kill you at any cost. However, with Math as your weapon, you are not trapped with the Zahlen - the Zahlen is trapped with you.

Features:

  • Balance the Output to stay in the game.
  • The longer you survive, the smaller the Output can become.
  • Each Zahl represents an archetype that shapes the battlefield.

Note from the Developer:

  • Diane

And also to these people who assisted in the game's development:
